idea-plugin.name: Archive Browser
idea-plugin.description: This plugin allows you to browse most archives like folders in IDEA. Supported archives (most of 7-zip supports): 7z, XZ, BZIP2, GZIP, TAR, ZIP, WIM, AR, ARJ, CAB, CHM, CPIO, CramFS, DMG, EXT, FAT, GPT, HFS, IHEX, ISO, LZH, LZMA, MBR, MSI, NSIS, NTFS, QCOW2, RAR, RPM, SquashFS, UDF, UEFI, VDI, VHD, VMDK, WIM, XAR and Z
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• Version 0.23
    • Fixed gz extension issue
    • Enhanced tar short names support
  • Version 0.22
    • Fixed description text markup
  • Version 0.21
    • Fixed file lock issues
    • Added .gem extension support
    • Raised compatibility requirements
  • Version 0.19
    • Nested archives support, fixed issue with .tgz and .gz extension
  • Version 0.16
    • Nested archives support, fixed issue with .tgz extension
  • Version 0.15
    • Nested archives support
  • Version 0.14
    • Added support for 7-zip utility compatible archives
  • Version 0.13
    • Fixed memory issues with GZIP files
  • Version 0.12
    • Fixed issue with project library files
    • Fixed issue with crash on particular GZIP files
  • Version 0.11
    • Expanded compatibility
